statement: A kangaroo cannot walk backwards due to its muscular tail.

fact: There are more languages spoken in Papua New Guinea than in any other country—over 800.

note: The world's quietest room, located in Minnesota, is so silent you can hear your own blood flowing.

statement: If you could fold a piece of paper 42 times, it would reach the Moon.

fact: Dolphins give each other names by developing specific whistles.

note: Snakes can sense heat through special pits in their faces, helping them locate warm-blooded prey.

statement: A group of jellyfish is called a 'smack.'

fact: The tongue print is as unique as a fingerprint.
